definitions.title: n. pr. loc.
definitions.body: in S. Judah;—Jos 15:31, LXX Seqennak, A Sansanna, LXXL Seenak; prob. = [[חֲחַר סוּסָה]] Jos 19:5, [[חֲחַר־סוּסִים]] 1Ch 4:31; conj. on loc. (near Gaza), v. in Di:ad loc. Buhl:Geogr. 163 and reff. (Simsum, NE. of Gaza, cp. by J. Schwarz:Das heilig. Land (1852), 72 van d. Velde:Mem, 346, is too far north).
